DOC.detailed_description: This double blind , crossover , pilot study examine effect SierraSil supplementation determinant human performance . Anaerobic capacity , muscle fatigue , severity delay onset muscle soreness ( DOMS ) marker inflammation measure 3 week supplementation SierraSil placebo . There 3 week washout period prior crossover ensure SierraSil supplementation residual effect .
